title: Other Resources I
name: Other Resources I
description:
A Map by P2ric

This map contains information gathered by Terry Grogan about various resources.

properties.name: Cost Analysis for Pollution Prevention
properties.description: Posted by P2ric 300 Desmond Drive Lacey, WA 98503State of Washington report written to help companies identify all the major costs involved in a current process, find possible pollution prevention alternatives, and then compare the costs and savings.

properties.name: Environmental Performance Index
properties.description: Posted by P2ric475 N. Martingale Road Schaumburg, IL 60173The Environmental Performance Index (EPI) provides a single overall rating of the corporation’s performance against its stated goals and involves measurement of twenty-five parameters related to regulatory compliance and contaminated site remediation.

properties.name: FEMP Energy Cost Calculators
properties.description: Posted by P2ric1000 Independence Ave., SW Washington, DC 20585-0121The calculators allow users to enter their own input values to estimate the energy cost savings from buying a more efficient product.

properties.name: Global Environmental Management Initiative Measurement and Metrics
properties.description: Posted by P2ric1155 15th Street, NW Washington, DC 20005Tips to help businesses measure, report and reduce their greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions are available through GEMI, a nonprofit organization of leading companies dedicated to fostering environmental, health and safety excellence worldwide through the sharing of tools and information in order for business to help business achieve environmental excellence.

properties.name: Guide for Measuring Compliance Assistance Outcomes
properties.description: Posted by P2ric1200 Pennsylvania Ave., NW Washington, D.C. 20460-0001The EPA prepared this document to help measure the impact of compliance assistance projects and activities (e.g., telephone helplines, compliance assistance tools, workshops) on the regulated community. The methodology presented in this guide also serves as pilot evaluation methodology under NPMS.

properties.name: P2Rx Topic Hub™ for Environmental Measurement
properties.description: Posted by P2ric129 Portland St., Boston, MA 02114-2014 This primer is intended as a quick guide to the essential P2 information on environmental measurement, as well as a compilation of pertinent on-line resources.

properties.name: Pollution Prevention World Information Network
properties.description: Posted by P2ric100 Charlotte Street Sarnia, ON N7T 4R2The Environmental Measurement Hub offers many resources for measuring environmental benefits.
